message.interactionExpired: This interaction has expired. Try to run the command and repeat the same process.
message.interactionError: An error occurred in the interaction. I am forwarding the error to the team to analyze and solve the problem.
message.interactionWithoutPermission: This interaction is not allowed to perform such processes as: {{0}}
message.interactionSuspectedBug: Oops! We detected something odd while working on the interaction. I am forwarding it to the team to investigate and resolve the issue.
message.interactionLimited: This interaction is limited to {{0}} users. And that's why this interaction is blocked for you.
message.interactionOtherUser: Oops! This interaction was initiated by someone else and therefore you do not have permission to control it.
message.interactionBanned: This interaction is blocked because you are banned from using ChinoKafuu commands or resources.
message.interactionTimeout: We noticed that this interaction took a long time to respond. Try to repeat the same process.
message.interactionBlockedToAttempt: This interaction was blocked because it has a suspected bug and takes a long time to load other functions. I am forwarding it to the team to analyze the problem. Try again later.
message.buttonInteractionExpired: This interaction button has expired. Try running command and repeating the same process.
message.menuInteractionExpired: This menu selection interaction has expired. Try to run command and repeat the same process.
message.itemsSelectedDoMenuLimited: Woah! There are too many items selected, you can only select {{0}} up to {{1}}
message.rateLimit: Currently, there are a lot of people using this feature right now, so it has been limited to avoid overloading the service. Try later.

permissions.permissionUserRequired: You must have the following permissions to use this command: {{0}}.
permissions.permissionBotRequired: I must have the following permissions to use this command: {{0}}.
permissions.title: Permissions

onMention: <:chino_rawr:751215250245943318> **|** Hello, {{0}}. My prefix is `{{1}}`. If you want to see what I can do, use `{{1}}help`.
missingBotPermission: I don't have the {{perm}} permission. Check my permissions/roles and try again.
missingUserPermission: you don't have the {{perm}} permission. You can't execute this command.
missingBotPermissionOnChannel: Hey {{0}} I don't have the {{1}} permission on {{2}}. Please, check my permissions and try again.
invalidUser: I can't find this person. Are you sure this user exist?
invalidRole: I can't find this role. Are you sure this role exist in this guild?
invalidEmoji: I can't find this emoji. Are you sure this emoji is from this guild?

punishment.bigReason: you must write an shorter reason, this reason is too big to me.
punishment.selfPunishment: sorry, but, as you're unable to punish yourself on normal Discord, you can't punish yourself by me.
punishment.ownerPunish: have you lost your mind? You can't punish this person, they're the owner of this guild.
punishment.error: I couldn't punish this member. Perhaps their roles are higher than mine. Check the roles and try again.

missingArgs: Invalid arguments! Use `{{prefix}}{{commandName}}` to see the correct usage.

addedToGuild.description:
Whoa {{0}}! Thanks for adding me in `{{1}}`, let me introduce myself.

I'm a little bot with many functions that can be useful, like... **moderation**, **fun** and **utilities**. By default, my prefix is `{{2}}`

If you need help, then join my support server using `{{2}}help` or `{{2}}invite`. Have fun and see you later.
addedToGuild.guildSaved: Successfully saved the server {{0}} in the database!

noAliases: This command doesn't have any aliases.

voice.authorAreNotInVoiceChannel: you've must be on a voice channel, but you're not.
voice.playerAlreadyPlaying: the radio is already playing on me.
voice.clientAreNotInVoiceChannel: I'm not in a voice channel right now, use `/animu play`.
voice.playerNotFound: I'm not in a playing anything right now, use `/animu play`.
voice.maxVolume: hey, calm down! The maximum volume allowed is `100`.
voice.minVolume: hey, calm down! The minimal volume allowed is `5`.

blockedChannel: you can't use commands here, go to {{0}} and try again.

migrate.migrateToSlashCommand: Hey! After January 2022 I'll only answer to slash commands, please, if you want to continue using me, then you must re-add me, you can do that by clicking [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&permissions=1378654604670&scope=bot%20applications.commands&guild_id={{1}}), you don't need to kick me out of the server. Thank you! If you want stop receive this message, type `{{2}}stopnotify`. <a:chino_petpet:760564885280784405>
migrate.disabledToSlashCommands: It's time to say goodbye to normal commands, now it's only available slash commands. Right now, this command is deprecated, but you can use me normally using slash commands, type `/help` to see my command list.
migrate.howToUseSlash:
1.) For old users who don't re-invited me to this server, you can re-invite me by clicking [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&permissions=1378654604670&scope=bot%20applications.commands&guild_id={{1}}), it's important you make sure that you've already re-invited me.
2.) The user need to have `Use Application Commands`'s permission to use my commands.
3.) If you are unable to see the slash commands, make sure you enabled `User Settings -> Text and Images -> Use slash commands and preview emojis, mentions, and markdown syntax as you type`
migrate.needSupportTitle: Still confused how to use the bot?
migrate.needSupportSlash: If you still confused how to using me properly, feel free to join our [support server](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC) to get help from our support team.
